title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.25 - Intermission between rounds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.25 - Intermission between rounds

State Regulations

There shall be a 60 second intermission between rounds, unless otherwise directed or authorized by the Commission. The referee, at the
request of the ringside physician, may extend this intermission, if necessary
to examine a participant, for up to 30 additional seconds. Notes

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
